name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
description: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.

passiveDescription.0: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <cryo>12%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.1: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <cryo>15%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.2: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <cryo>18%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.3: Increases DMG dealt against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <cryo>21%</cryo>.
passiveDescription.4: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by <cryo>24%</cryo>.
